message: My cousin married a McCarthy. I just spotted this: http://gallery.me.com/daddyflo#100006/IMG_2517&bgcolor=black  Did a bit of research(listen to this guy...he's a riot) http://whiskyreviews.blogspot.com/2009/03/mccarthys-single-malt-3-yo-islay-style.html

McCarthy looks like it's on sale here: http://www.liquoroutletwinecellars.com/sku06514.html?utm_source=Google Products&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=CLEAR CREEK SCOTCH MCCARTHY'S OREGON SINGLE MALT I haven't tried it yet. Has anyone else?
